definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: in lowland of Judah Jos 15:44 (LXX Akiezei kai\ Kezeib, LXXL Axzeib), Mic 1:14 (LXX oi)/Kouv matai/ouv; v. also [[כְּזִיב]], [[כּׂזֵבָא]]).

in Asher Ju Jdg 1:31 (LXX Asxazei), and ([[אַכְזִ֫יבָה]]) Jos 19:29 (LXX Exozob, A Axzeif, LXXL Axazeib); it lay on the coast S. of Tyre, in As. Akzibi, COT:Jos 19:29 Dl:Par. 284; Gk. Ekdippa; mod. ez-Zîb, Bd:Pal. 272 Buhl:G. § 120 and (on pronunciation) Kasteren:ZPV xiii. 101.
